headline: Seagate Technology Holdings (NasdaqGS:STX) Slides 8% As Tech Sector Faces Economic Uncertainty
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings (NasdaqGS:STX) experienced a 8% decline in its share price over the past month, potentially reflecting broader market concerns around economic slowdown and tariffs, as evidenced by the Dow and S&P 500 being on track for their worst week in two years. This period has seen market volatility, with the Nasdaq dropping over 1.6% amid global economic uncertainties and tech sector fluctuations. Seagate's performance could also be influenced by industry trends affecting...
